questions.question: I studied in Utrecht for one year. Can I get an exemption for some courses and what can I do to get it?

choices.answer: No, first year students are only allowed to have fun next to their studies
Yes, but this is only the case for certain courses
Yes, and you can have them accredited by the Examination Board

Yes, DUO will lend you extra money

Nee
